ability_info.title: Artificial Satellite
ability_info.desc: Protects from most harmful abilities.

ability_info.title: Electro Shocker
ability_info.desc: Does shock damage to a nearby foe. Effective versus larger creatures.

ability_info.title: Particle Disintegrator
ability_info.desc: Does pure damage to a nearby foe. Bonus based on it's missing health.

ability_info.title: Unit Materializer
ability_info.desc: Summons a creature on the combat field that will serve and obey orders.

ability_info.title: Post Mortem
ability_info.desc: Drops a powerful fuse bomb on the ground when dying (lasts 1 round).

ability_info.title: Sword Slash
ability_info.desc: Swift attack on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Pistol Shots
ability_info.desc: Delivers a ranged shot within 6 hexes. Can be used twice per round.

ability_info.title: Rifle Shot
ability_info.desc: Very powerful long range attack.

ability_info.title: Backstabber
ability_info.desc: Reduces damage from behind and returns some to all melee attackers.

ability_info.title: Metallic Claws
ability_info.desc: Razor sharp claws help him really shred his foes.

ability_info.title: Tail Mace
ability_info.desc: Whips out it's scepter like tail to bluntly punish a distant foe.

ability_info.title: Brain Power
ability_info.desc: Electro-charges it's brain functions to shock all nearby creatures.

ability_info.title: Spore Contamination
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their regrowth stat constantly reduced with each round.
ability_info.info: 2 stacks on contact, -1 stack per turn

ability_info.title: Supper Chomp
ability_info.desc: Takes a huge bite out of his foe, restoring a minor amount of health.

ability_info.title: Frogger Jump
ability_info.desc: Leaps in straight line over obstacles, gaining bonus offense after landing.
ability_info.info: +30 offense for next hit if not moving

ability_info.title: Blade Kick
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using feet claws.

ability_info.title: Scorched Ground
ability_info.desc: Ignites some of the ground under, lasting 1 round or until stepped on.

ability_info.title: Pulverizing Punch
ability_info.desc: Smacks a foe with its heavy hand, gaining bonus damage every hit.

ability_info.title: Fissure Vent
ability_info.desc: Smashes his fists into the ground, wreaking fierce havoc in area ahead.

ability_info.title: Molten Hurl
ability_info.desc: Turns into a molten boulder, bowling itself into first foe in a straight line. Ignores all the traps along the way.

ability_info.title: Electrified Hair
ability_info.desc: Absorbs half of all incoming shock damage, using up to 25 on attacks.

ability_info.title: Deadly Jab
ability_info.desc: Horn attack that gains bonus offense based on the last distance traveled.

ability_info.title: Poisonous Vine
ability_info.desc: Makes use of tongue to envenom horn, mostly effective for a turn.

ability_info.title: Super Slash
ability_info.desc: Damages up to 3 nearby creatures. 200% offense against fatigued ones.

ability_info.title: Snow Storm
ability_info.desc: Foes have their movement reduced and initiative constantly decreased.

ability_info.title: Frost Bite
ability_info.desc: Exhales freezing gas that does full damage nearby or half further away.
ability_info.info: 20 frost damage nearby or 10 if away

ability_info.title: Frozen Orb
ability_info.desc: Creates an ice sphere and throws it at a target within range, freezing it.

ability_info.title: Glacial Spikes
ability_info.desc: Several spears of ice erupt from its body, impaling all nearby creatures.

ability_info.title: Greater Pyre
ability_info.desc: Fries all adjacent creatures after taking damage and still being alive.

ability_info.title: Fiery Claw
ability_info.desc: Scratches and burns a nearby foe. This attack has 1 hex extra reach.

ability_info.title: Burning Eye
ability_info.desc: Strategically teleports to a new location on the combat field.
ability_info.info: Reduces 1 burn stat to nearby foes.

ability_info.title: Fire Ball
ability_info.desc: Throws a ball of fire that explodes on impact, damaging several creatures.

ability_info.title: Unstoppable Hate
ability_info.desc: 1/2 regrowth works even if fatigued.

ability_info.title: Knuckle Head
ability_info.desc: Smashes ringed head into a foe.

ability_info.title: Meat Hook
ability_info.desc: Drags a foe, doing bonus damage if it doesn't have any movement points.

ability_info.title: Double Swipe
ability_info.desc: Slaps frontal units with both claws.

ability_info.title: Frozen Tower
ability_info.desc: Constantly increases offense and defense for every turn not moving.

ability_info.title: Icy Talons
ability_info.desc: Scratches nearby foe using claws, lowering frost stat with every hit.

ability_info.title: Tail Uppercut
ability_info.desc: Sucker punches a near enemy using limb, bypassing defensive abilities.

ability_info.title: Icicle Tongue
ability_info.desc: Launches a shard that can penetrate up to 6 hexagons that are all aligned.

ability_info.title: Inner Vision
ability_info.desc: Lack of sight forces the creature to focus on all its other senses.

ability_info.title: Tongue Dagger
ability_info.desc: Melee attack on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Sonic Scream
ability_info.desc: Shock waves that travel far.

ability_info.title: Psychic Blast
ability_info.desc: Focuses the power of mind in order to attack foes from a small region.

ability_info.title: Travel Waypoint
ability_info.desc: Transfer from a shroom to another.

ability_info.title: Head Bash
ability_info.desc: Bumps it's large cap into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Noxious Cloud
ability_info.desc: Releases several toxic clouds all around, persisting for several rounds.

ability_info.title: Tiny Mushroom
ability_info.desc: Drops a shroom that serves as a waypoint or a poisonous trap.

ability_info.title: Bunny Hopping
ability_info.desc: Moves away one hexagon from first enemy that comes nearby frontaly.
ability_info.info: Works only once every game round.

ability_info.title: Big Nip
ability_info.desc: Dents nearby foe using it's big teeth.

ability_info.title: Blowing Wind
ability_info.desc: Pushes away any creature for several hexagons, depending on its size.

ability_info.title: Chilling Spit
ability_info.desc: Spits diagonal foe with cold saliva. Bonus damage based on distance.

ability_info.title: Decaying Carcass
ability_info.desc: When dead, it's corpse rots fast and emanates deadly poisonous gases.

ability_info.title: Rabid Bite
ability_info.desc: Sink poisonous teeth into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Bad Breath
ability_info.desc: Stinks up several nearby enemies, causing them to move away a hex.

ability_info.title: Goo Blast
ability_info.desc: Sneezes contagious toxin on a rather distant foe, spreading on proximity.
ability_info.info: 15 poison damage and 5 regrowth debuff that stacks and even spreads.

ability_info.title: Gooey Body
ability_info.desc: Recovers 1/6 health at start of turn for every allie creature that's nearby.

ability_info.title: Gummy Mallet
ability_info.desc: Transforms itself into a rubber hammer to strike a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Royal Seal
ability_info.desc: Sticks chewing gum in place to hinder enemy movement for a turn.
ability_info.info: Allied units are not affected by this.

ability_info.title: Boom Box
ability_info.desc: Turns belly into a speaker, blasting a distant foe, pushing it back a notch.

ability_info.title: Eye Shield
ability_info.desc: Reduces frontal damage up to half.

ability_info.title: Optic Blast
ability_info.desc: Zaps a foe with it's laser cannon. Does more damage at closer range.

ability_info.title: Tractor Beam
ability_info.desc: Pulls a distant unit several hexagons closer, depending on its overall size.

ability_info.title: Switch Places
ability_info.desc: Swaps places of any two creatures in front that have similar sizes overall.
ability_info.info: Ability does not work on summoners.

ability_info.title: Ground Shaker
ability_info.desc: Stomps the ground when walking, increasing the delay of all it's foes.

ability_info.title: Lava Splash
ability_info.desc: Hits a near foe with a handful of lava.

ability_info.title: Volcanic Cannon
ability_info.desc: Fires a flaming boulder projectile at a target location, hitting next round. Land is scorched if it's being empty.

ability_info.title: Spitfire
ability_info.desc: Erupts with rage, bombarding the battlefield with hot burning lava.

ability_info.title: Spiked Fence
ability_info.desc: Foes walking on corpse get impaled and receive extra damage when hit.

ability_info.title: Trident Forehead
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe with its forehead.

ability_info.title: Crocodile Clip
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe, crippling it for 1 movement point for its next turn.

ability_info.title: Circular Saw
ability_info.desc: Travels in a straight line to a new location, cutting through creatures.

ability_info.title: Rib Cage
ability_info.desc: Bonus stats for every unit that dies.

ability_info.title: Claw Strike
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using claws.

ability_info.title: Fly Swarm
ability_info.desc: Damages and distracts a foe, lowering it's offense and defense.
ability_info.info: -20 offense and defense for a round

ability_info.title: Shadow Army
ability_info.desc: Allows a long dead creature to come and fight again, as a shadow being.
ability_info.info: All shadows vanish if creature dies.

ability_info.title: Blood Chalice
ability_info.desc: Nearby damage restores own health.

ability_info.title: Slice
ability_info.desc: Claw swipe gesture on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Fatal Attraction
ability_info.desc: Causes a target foe to come close to her, while depleting its movement.
ability_info.info: Ability does not work on summoners.

ability_info.title: Tentacle Feet
ability_info.desc: All nearby foes have their movement restrained and take some damage.

ability_info.title: High Voltage
ability_info.desc: Melee attackers receive damage for every hit and also lose energy points.

ability_info.title: Suction cups
ability_info.desc: Crushes a frontal foe while draining a small amount of its maximum health.

ability_info.title: Fishing Net
ability_info.desc: Pulls a rather distant inline creature nearby while also crushing it a little.

ability_info.title: Frostbite Shower
ability_info.desc: Sprinkles the area in front with liquid nitrogen, doing cold damage.

ability_info.title: Half Life
ability_info.desc: Can regenerate health up to double.

ability_info.title: Bone Scythe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe, causing it to bleed and lose health if moving.

ability_info.title: Blood Puke
ability_info.desc: Targets regrowth becomes lowered if it's a foe or increased if it's an ally.

ability_info.title: Symbiotic Tumor
ability_info.desc: Engulfs body into a meat cocoon. This ability ends the current turn.

ability_info.title: Lava Pool
ability_info.desc: When dead, melts into puddle of boiling lava that damages foes.
ability_info.info: 10 burn damage per step or turn

ability_info.title: Eye Poke
ability_info.desc: Swings its eye at a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Black Pearl
ability_info.desc: Fires a durable sphere up in to the air, falling on target the next round.

ability_info.title: Iron Shell
ability_info.desc: Solidifies from magma state into iron, greatly increasing resistances.

ability_info.title: Forced Involution
ability_info.desc: When dead, reconfigures itself as a weaker creature, the Magma Spawn.

ability_info.title: Forked Hand
ability_info.desc: Pierces foe using it's metallic harpoon shaped fingers.

ability_info.title: Fire Dump
ability_info.desc: Ignites the ground, the fire expands and contracts over several rounds.

ability_info.title: Shotgun Blast
ability_info.desc: Blows a handful of shrapnel in a conic area, doing versatile damage.

ability_info.title: Healing Factor
ability_info.desc: Able to regenerate even if fatigued.

ability_info.title: Gauntlet Strike
ability_info.desc: Punches a nearby foe with it's heavy armored hand, leaving quite a mark.

ability_info.title: Bloody Greed
ability_info.desc: Powerful sword penetrating attack, affecting multiple inline hexagons.

ability_info.title: Supreme Motivation
ability_info.desc: Greed drives it to do an extra effort and act twice in the current round.
ability_info.info: Ability only usable once per round.

ability_info.title: Self Sewing
ability_info.desc: Partially repairs itself if not taking any damage for a whole round.

ability_info.title: Razorblade
ability_info.desc: Slices a nearby foe, keeping samples.

ability_info.title: Scarecrow
ability_info.desc: Intimidates a nearby foe, making it run away until it meets an allie.
ability_info.info: If already acted, it will run next turn.

ability_info.title: Voodoo Doll
ability_info.desc: Stabs itself, doing mental damage to any of the previously attacked foes.

ability_info.title: Immortal Tree
ability_info.desc: Ressurects itself within a few rounds with half of health from last time if no creature is on top of the corpse.

ability_info.title: Stalagmite Teeth
ability_info.desc: Pierces nearby foe with it's denture.

ability_info.title: Weed Field
ability_info.desc: Nasty weeds instantly grow at a location within range, damaging and traping foes depending on their size.

ability_info.title: Waterfall Cannon
ability_info.desc: Powerful jet of water that damages several time, either knocking target back a bit or doing bonus damage.

ability_info.desc: No description

ability_info.desc: No description

ability_info.title: Tankish Build
ability_info.desc: 20% bonus to masteries and defense.

ability_info.title: Stomp'A'Fool
ability_info.desc: Deals damage to nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Stone Grinder
ability_info.desc: Destroys fatigued one or two hexagon creature or corpse.

ability_info.title: Charcoal Blast
ability_info.desc: Bombards an area with burning coal.
ability_info.info: 10 crush to target + 10 burn in area

ability_info.title: Bad Touch
ability_info.desc: Every three strikes, a melee attacker is turned to gold for a whole round.

ability_info.title: Crystal Staff
ability_info.desc:
Pokes nearby foe using the staff.
This attack has extended reach.

ability_info.title: Winged Orb
ability_info.desc: Heals an ally or damages a foe that's at the target location within 1 round.
ability_info.info: 20 heal to ally or burn damage to foe

ability_info.title: Burning Light
ability_info.desc: Conjures an energy beam that causes multiple burning hits to first inline.

ability_info.title: Tiny Offspring
ability_info.desc: Spawns a little hungry eggplant that chases nearest foe and then attacks.
ability_info.info: Grows into an adult if it kills target.

ability_info.title: Dinner Time
ability_info.desc: Bites a nearby foe, gaining 10 bonus offense with every consecutive hit.

ability_info.title: Pony Tail
ability_info.desc: Whips and poisons all nearby units.

ability_info.title: Snake Tongue
ability_info.desc: Drags a somewhat distant inline unit close while also doing damage to it.

ability_info.title: Bad Dog
ability_info.desc: Bites any frontal foes that stop by, also retaliates against rear attackers.

ability_info.title: Metal Hand
ability_info.desc: Injures a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Dead Eye
ability_info.desc: Studies foe within sight and gains bonus offense & defense against it.

ability_info.title: Rocket Launcher
ability_info.desc: Fires up to 3 missiles that travel a fair distance, doing nice damage.

ability_info.title: Cold Rain
ability_info.desc: Attackers get damaged and have their frost stat constantly reduced.

ability_info.title: Harpoon Claw
ability_info.desc: Uses fingers against a nearby foe, doing more damage to it each time.

ability_info.title: Sea Serpent
ability_info.desc: Hits a nearby area using its tail, damaging one or two creatures.

ability_info.title: Tsunami Wave
ability_info.desc: Travels in a straight line to a new spot, damaging all creatures while also ignoring traps along the way.

ability_info.title: Percussion Spear
ability_info.desc: Attacks cause rear spear strike, which cannot be dodged.

ability_info.title: Executioner Axe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe, doing bonus damage based on its max health.

ability_info.title: Dragon Flight
ability_info.desc: Travels to a location passing over obstacles with no movement cost.
ability_info.info: +25 offense for next hit if not moving

ability_info.title: Life Breath
ability_info.desc: Brings back to life a dead ally for 3 rounds, after which it disintegrates.

ability_info.title: Intimidating
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their offense and defense reduced for a full round.

ability_info.title: Wrist Blade
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using blade.

ability_info.title: Chain Whip
ability_info.desc: Short ranged attack that pushes back target a hexagon if it's nearby.

ability_info.title: Overpower
ability_info.desc: Increases offense and defense until attacking or getting hit current turn.

ability_info.title: Shield Block
ability_info.desc: Uses shield to defend against frontal attacks, greatly reducing damage.

ability_info.title: Mace Strike
ability_info.desc: Does versatile damage to nearby foe. Constantly reduces target's defense.

ability_info.title: Lion Charge
ability_info.desc: Runs very fast towards a foe up to 5 hexagons and savagely strikes it.

ability_info.title: Super Cloak
ability_info.desc: Moves through units to destination, damaging every foe along the way while also ignoring all obstacles.

ability_info.title: Perstilence
ability_info.desc: Foes have regrowth and meditation constantly reduced every few rounds.

ability_info.title: Gnarled Staff
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe using wooden staff.

ability_info.title: Rock Shard
ability_info.desc: Summons obstacle at inline location, doing some damage when erupting.

ability_info.title: Furious Twister
ability_info.desc: Summons tornado that travels inline every round, bashing all creatures.

ability_info.title: Spa Mud
ability_info.desc: Gains temporary bonus regrowth and defense when entering a mud bath.

ability_info.title: Power Bat
ability_info.desc: Pokes baseball bat into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Ground Ball
ability_info.desc: Strikes a mud boulder towards a foe. Usable on one of the 3 inline rows.

ability_info.title: Mud Bath
ability_info.desc: Orders a pile of mud at a location, slowing units passing through it.

ability_info.title: Crossed Bones
ability_info.desc: Blocks damage from frontal attacks. Effect decreases on consecutive hits.

ability_info.title: Shark Attack
ability_info.desc: Bytes a nearby foe, lowering its maximum health by one each time.

ability_info.title: Fire Breath
ability_info.desc: Ranged attack that damages first encountered units on several rows.

ability_info.title: Crystal Meditation
ability_info.desc: Heals nearby allies and damages foes partially based on their size.
ability_info.info: 10 pure damage or heal per hex

ability_info.title: Maggot Infestation
ability_info.desc: Strikes any rear foe at beginning of turn, infesting it with a parasite.

ability_info.title: Scapel Limbs
ability_info.desc: Hits nearby foe using frontal blades. Double damage if unit is fatigued.
ability_info.info: 12 pierce damage Ã— 2 vs fatigued foe

ability_info.title: Whip Slash
ability_info.desc: Grasps a distant foe, pulling itself to it, doing damage based on distance.

ability_info.title: Boomerang Throw
ability_info.desc: Forms a new weapon out of scapels and throws it away, flying right back.

ability_info.title: Hunting Horn
ability_info.desc: Moves 2 hexes towards closest foe. Movement points are not deducted.
ability_info.info: This creature can not be delayed.

ability_info.title: Hammer Time
ability_info.desc: Hits up to 3 nearby frontal foes, less targets are being hit multiple times.

ability_info.title: Fishing Hook
ability_info.desc: Pierces small or medium creature, throwing it back, swapping places.

ability_info.title: Tentacle Bush
ability_info.desc: Defensive stance that increases total defense and slaps nearby attackers.

ability_info.title: Death Dealer
ability_info.desc: Gains bonus offense for every kill.

ability_info.title: Trap Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe, making it lose some maximum health based on damage.

ability_info.title: Spinal Tap
ability_info.desc: Strikes nearby foe using back spikes, not allowing it to regenerate a turn.

ability_info.title: Skull Bolt
ability_info.desc: Uses parts from every single killed unit as a high damage projectile.

ability_info.title: Bat Country
ability_info.desc: First attacker receives some damage.

ability_info.title: Mega Slicer
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using the claws. Target loses 20 defense for 3 rounds.

ability_info.title: Sublimal Scream
ability_info.desc: Does damage to a conic area nearby. Lowers initiative of all affected units.

ability_info.title: Eclipsing Leap
ability_info.desc: Catapults itself over up to 3 units with low health, squashing them all.
ability_info.info: Targets need to sum under 60 health.

ability_info.desc: Can fly to available locations within movement range, avoiding obstacles.

ability_info.title: Slicing Talon
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using claws.

ability_info.title: Special Delivery
ability_info.desc: Drops a boulder at the selected location, damaging a creature.

ability_info.title: Escort Service
ability_info.desc: Carries any small or medium creature to a new location. Also damages foes.

ability_info.title: Cyclic Duality
ability_info.desc: Allows the use of an attack twice.

ability_info.title: Tooth Fairy
ability_info.desc: Syncs teeth into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Power Note
ability_info.desc: Sings a powerful note inline that keeps on going when killing units.

ability_info.title: Chain Lightning
ability_info.desc: Releases a lightning bolt that will arch, shocking multiple creatures.

ability_info.desc: Armor shaped head grants double defense against frontal attacks.

ability_info.title: Whip Master
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using tongue, reducing its initiative for two turns.

ability_info.title: Double Slap
ability_info.desc: Strikes nearby foe, pushing it back or else completely ignoring its defense.

ability_info.title: Meteor Slam
ability_info.desc: Regurgitates a sphere and throws it at pretty much any target location.

ability_info.title: Bone Head
ability_info.desc: Frontal attacks cause less damage.

ability_info.title: Free Haircut
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using scissors.

ability_info.title: Flying Cleaver
ability_info.desc: Jumps over a nearby creature, slicing it with its large abdominal bone axe.

ability_info.title: Hoof Strike
ability_info.desc: Bashes nearby foe, pushing it back a couple hexagons, based on its size. Double offence against rear enemies.
ability_info.info: 25 crush damage, up to 3 hexes push

ability_info.desc: Ranged fire attack that bounces left and right each time it hits a creature.

ability_info.title: Ethereal Body
ability_info.desc: Passes through obstacles and only takes half of the incoming damage.

ability_info.title: Hand Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe using its... hand. Steals 5 energy points from target.

ability_info.title: Sorrow Visions
ability_info.desc: Causes a foe within range to fall into depression and not act for one turn.

ability_info.title: Sleeping Mummy
